fields.name: Anyone
fields.description: General awareness scenarios for anyone who uses email or online platforms â€” learn to spot and report phishing attempts effectively.

fields.name: IT
fields.description: Focused simulations for IT personnel to identify sophisticated phishing tactics and respond with technical precision.

fields.name: Students
fields.description: Interactive simulations designed to help students recognize and avoid phishing attacks in academic or personal settings.

fields.title: Email from Bank: Verify your account
fields.content: An email pretending to be from a bank. The goal: identify suspicious domains and report phishing links.

fields.title: Reset Password Request (Fake IT)
fields.content: A fake IT email asks you to reset your password. Learn: verify sender, never click unknown links, report to security.

fields.title: Malicious Attachment Simulation
fields.content: Learn safe attachment handling, sandbox testing, and threat analysis.

fields.title: Fake System Update (Spear Phishing)
fields.content: Check sender domains, validate DKIM/SPF, verify official update sources.

fields.title: Executive Spear Phishing
fields.content: Analyze context clues, detect manipulation, and report suspicious emails.

fields.title: Post-Phish Response Simulation
fields.content: Learn how to recover compromised accounts, change passwords, and report incidents.
